==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|しょう|ひ|ぜい|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
From {{ja-r|消費|しょうひ|gloss=[[consumption]]}} + {{ja-r|税|ぜい|gloss=[[tax]]}}

===Pronunciation===
* Common Accent: {{ja-accent-common|nakadaka|しょ|うひ|ぜい|shòúhízèì}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しょうひぜい}}
# a tax added to the price when purchasing goods or services.
# {{lb|ja|economics|sort=しょうひぜい}} [[consumption tax]], a tax levied on consumption of goods and services.
# {{lb|ja|legal|sort=しょうひぜい}} an indirect tax levied on consumption by the Japanese national government. (compare {{ja-r|地方消費税|ちほう しょうひぜい|gloss=local consumption tax}})
